item.description:
The weather looks good finally for saturday afternoon ride around Cape Ann

 

Riding pace will be 13-15mph

Route Summary:
http://goo.gl/maps/0FBQQ

Riders should plan to meet at 2:45pm and be ready to ride around 3:00pm

We should return to the parking lot at 6:00pm.

Roads are in ok shape, some sand and debris from winter.

It is a good idea to check your bike out if you haven't ridden all winter.


Starting point
Stage Fort Park Visitor Center (bathrooms were still closed a few weeks ago, public bathrooms in Rockport are open)


Required
---------------------------------
Full fingered Gloves, Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 1 full water bottles

bring snacks and money for a warm drink in Rockport when we take a break


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/CapeAnn26.txt
item.how_to_find_us: Visitor Center Parking Lot, near playground
item.name: Cape Ann Loop 26 miles
